title: Citi's Candi Wolff Named One of 25 Most Influential Women in Washington D.C.
summary: Candi Wolff, Citi Executive Vice President of Government Affairs, was recently named one of Washington D.C.'s 25 most influential women by National Journal.
tag-1: Citi's Candi Wolff Named One of 25 Most Influential Women in Washington D.C.
